Compilation [Windows]¶

Setup¶

Important

Make sure the newest version of CEINMS is installed on your system before proceeding to this section. A guide to installing CEINMS can be found in the Installation section

CMake-GUI¶

During the installation process, CMake-GUI has been installed on your system. We will now use this software to create a visual studio solution from which we can build the CEINMS executable. First, search for CMake-GUI by opening the windows search bar. this can be done by pressing the windows key and typing “cmake”. after finding CMake-GUI, open it.

You will now be greeted with the GUI of CMake, At the top of the window are two important fields:

Where is the source code and Where to build the binaries.
